title: Manage a Medical Education Grant
description: A medical affairs coordinator receives a request for a medical education grant from a professional society and must process it.

tasks.description: Log the incoming grant request into the grant management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new record for the request.

tasks.description: Verify that the request is for a legitimate, independent educational activity and not promotional.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the request and confirms it meets the criteria for an independent medical education grant.

tasks.description: Route the request to the grant review committee for a decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the request to the committee.

tasks.description: If approved, process the payment to the professional society.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the payment process for the approved grant amount.
